item.text: Now on the first day of the week, at early dawn, the women went to the tomb, taking the aromatic spices they had prepared.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> that the <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st> had been <st data-num="617">rolled away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> when they <st data-num="1525">went in</st>, they did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">While</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="639" class="">perplexed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="2400" class="">suddenly</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="2186">stood beside</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="797" class="">dazzling</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2066" class="">attire</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">women</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1719">terribly frightened</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2827" class="">bowed</st><n id="4" /> their <st data-num="4383" class="">faces</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st>, but the men <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> do you <st data-num="2212">look for</st> the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>?

He <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> has been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3415" class="">Remember</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">how</st> he <st data-num="2980" class="">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, while he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2089">still</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st>,<n id="2" />

that<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> be <st data-num="3860" class="">delivered</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> of <st data-num="268" class="">sinful</st> <st data-num="444" class="">men</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> on the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="450" class="">rise</st> again.”<n id="5" />
<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the women <st data-num="3415" class="">remembered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when they <st data-num="5290" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>, they <st data-num="518" class="">told</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> to the <st data-num="1733" class="">eleven</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> <st data-num="3094" class="">Magdalene</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2489" class="">Joanna</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> the mother of <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3062">other women</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> who <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st> <st data-num="5316" class="">seemed</st> <st data-num="5616" class="">like</st> pure <st data-num="3026" class="">nonsense</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1799" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they did <st data-num="569">not believe</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
But Peter got up and ran to the tomb. He bent down and saw only the strips of linen cloth; then he went home, wondering what had happened.
Now that very day two of them were on their way to a village called Emmaus, about seven miles from Jerusalem.

<st data-num="846" class="">They</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="3656" class="">talking</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="240">each other</st> <st data-num="4012">about</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="3778" class="">things</st> that had <st data-num="4819" class="">happened</st>.

<st data-num="1722">While</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="3656" class="">talking</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4802" class="">debating</st><n id="2" /> these things,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="1448" class="">approached</st> and began to <st data-num="4848" class="">accompany</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>

(<st data-num="1161">but</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> were <st data-num="2902" class="">kept</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">recognizing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him)</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> are <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">matters</st><n id="2" /> you are <st data-num="474" class="">discussing</st> so intently<n id="3" /> as you <st data-num="4043">walk along</st>?” <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="2476">stood still</st>, <st data-num="4659">looking sad</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Then</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of them, <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="2810" class="">Cleopas</st>, <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “Are <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="3441" class="">only</st> <st data-num="3939" class="">visitor</st> to <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> who <st data-num="3756">doesn’t</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st><n id="2" /> the things that have <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st> <st data-num="846">there</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>?”

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4169">What things</st>?” “<st data-num="3588" class="">The things</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3479" class="">Nazarene</st>,” they <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>, “a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st><n id="2" /> who, with his <st data-num="1415" class="">powerful</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st>, <st data-num="1096">proved to be</st> a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1726" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people;</st>

<st data-num="5037">and</st> <st data-num="3704" class="">how</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="758">leaders</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">handed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">over</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1519" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">condemned</st> to <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> had <st data-num="1679" class="">hoped</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> the one who <st data-num="3195">was going to</st> <st data-num="3084" class="">redeem</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>. <st data-num="235">Not only</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, but it is now the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="575" class="">since</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st>.

<st data-num="235 2532">Furthermore</st>, <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> <st data-num="1537">of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> group <st data-num="1839" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.<n id="1" /> They<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="3720" class="">early</st> this <st data-num="3720" class="">morning</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when they did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>, they <st data-num="2064">came back</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> they had <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> a <st data-num="3701" class="">vision</st> of <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="2198" class="">alive</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of those who were <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> it <st data-num="2531">just as</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> had <st data-num="3004">said</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> they did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5599">You</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="453">foolish people</st><n id="3" />—how <st data-num="1021" class="">slow</st> of <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> have <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st>!

<st data-num="3780">Wasn’t</st><n id="1" /> it <st data-num="1163" class="">necessary</st><n id="2" /> for the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>?”
Then beginning with Moses and all the prophets, he interpreted to them the things written about himself in all the scriptures.
So they approached the village where they were going. He acted as though he wanted to go farther,
but they urged him, “Stay with us because it is getting toward evening and the day is almost done.” So he went in to stay with them.
When he had taken his place at the table with them, he took the bread, blessed and broke it, and gave it to them.

<st data-num="1161">At this point</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> were <st data-num="1272" class="">opened</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="1921" class="">recognized</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="855">vanished out of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="855">sight</st>.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="240">each other</st>, “<st data-num="3780">Didn’t</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2545" class="">burn</st> within us<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">while</st> he was <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> with <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">while</st> he was <st data-num="1272" class="">explaining</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>?”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="450">got up</st> that <st data-num="846" class="">very</st> <st data-num="846" class="">hour</st> and <st data-num="5290" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="2" /> They<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> the <st data-num="1733" class="">eleven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4867" class="">gathered together</st>

and<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> has <st data-num="3689" class="">really</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">risen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> has <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> to <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>!”<n id="2" />
Then they told what had happened on the road, and how they recognized him when he broke the bread.
While they were saying these things, Jesus himself stood among them and said to them, “Peace be with you.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they were <st data-num="4422" class="">startled</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1719" class="">terrified</st>, <st data-num="1380" class="">thinking</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="4151" class="">ghost</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st> <st data-num="1510">are</st> you <st data-num="5015" class="">frightened</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223 5101">why</st> do <st data-num="1261">doubts</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="305" class="">arise</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>?

<st data-num="1492">Look at</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet;</st> it’s <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5584" class="">Touch</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> see; a <st data-num="4151" class="">ghost</st><n id="2" /> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3747" class="">bones</st> <st data-num="2531" class="">like</st> you <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>.”

When he had <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, he <st data-num="1166" class="">showed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> while <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> could <st data-num="569" class="">not believe</st> it<n id="1" /> (<st data-num="575">because of</st> their <st data-num="5479" class="">joy)</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st>,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Do you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="1759" class="">here</st> to <st data-num="1034" class="">eat</st>?”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1929" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="3313" class="">piece</st> of <st data-num="3702" class="">broiled</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>,
and he took it and ate it in front of them.
Then he said to them, “These are my words that I spoke to you while I was still with you, that everything written about me in the law of Moses and the prophets and the psalms must be fulfilled.”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="1272" class="">opened</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3563" class="">minds</st> so they could <st data-num="4920" class="">understand</st> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3779">Thus</st> it stands <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> that the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> would <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> would <st data-num="450" class="">rise</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> on the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="859" class="">forgiveness</st> of <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> would be <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaimed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="757" class="">beginning</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="4" />
<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> are <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3778">these things</st>.
And look, I am sending you what my Father promised. But stay in the city until you have been clothed with power from on high.”
Then Jesus led them out as far as Bethany, and lifting up his hands, he blessed them.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722">during</st> the <st data-num="2127" class="">blessing</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="1339" class="">departed</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="399">taken up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiped</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="5290" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>,<n id="3" />
and were continually in the temple courts blessing God.
